event.title: gained notoriety because of his escape during Christmas

data.event: Dr. James Phillips Crow Captain Jim Crow â€” Young CSA officer who gained notoriety because of his escape during Christmas week 1861 from Glenn House and subsequent capture by a column of Union riders under General Prentiss.

event.title: was born near Paris and was the youngest son of Monroe County pioneer Dr. Samuel Crow, who was a veteran of the War of 1812

data.event: Captain Crow was born near Paris and was the youngest son of Monroe County pioneer Dr. Samuel Crow, who was a veteran of the War of 1812.
